QuestData.Title: The Heart of Ardenweald
QuestData.Description:
I hid my sigil in the Heart of the Forest, to keep it safe from the forces of the Maw.
But the horn has called for aid.
You and your allies go, see what has prompted the call.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to the Winter Queen outside the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText:
Our best efforts were still in vain.
Our enemy's plan edges closer to fruition.
